activities: Lotsa Helping Hands provides a web-based service where individuals may create a private volunteer / caregiving coordination community. The community displays a calendar of activities for which other community members may sign up.  (For example, meals delivery, transportation, housecleaning, babysitting, visits.)  In addition, community members may also post and review announcements, photos, useful resources, blogs, and well wishes.  For community members designated with the appropriate permissions, there are also sections for storing and retrieving relevant medical, legal, and financial information of the person being helped.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Lotsa Helping Hands makes the commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities (DPAs) located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
